meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Summit High School, Summit, Summit Phoenix, Charter School, Credit Recovery, graduation, bulldogs,

td.div: Here at Summit you will find caring, highly qualified teachers and staff who work to build a safe and positive learning environment that recognizes and award student success. We provide flexible scheduling, opportunities for credit recovery, and a balanced program of study that includes core and elective classes, on a Monday - Thursday schedule. We support our students through staff-operated mentoring and tutoring programs. With an established and respected art program, as well as a full Structured English Immersion program, Summit High School can offer students experiences that will help them grow and achieve success.

br.font: 728 East mcdowell road, phoenix, az 85006 | P (602) 258-8959
